description: A giant continent country with various climates and unique ecosystems both onland and inocean
A country known for it's cuisine, history and culture. If you dare to venture off the beaten path there you can stumble uppon many hidden gems
4000km long from South to North and only as wide as 200km, this two dimensional country spans all the climates and landscapes you can imagine
Rich in culture and famous for it's incredible food. This spicy country is filled with diverse nature and spiritualism
